title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AI-powered resilience testing and disaster recovery (COP420)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AI驱动的弹性测试和灾难恢复 (COP420)
abstract: Not all disaster recovery strategies can address the complex, dynamic nature of modern cloud infrastructures, leading to gaps in system resilience and compliance adherence. Discover how to enhance resilience and disaster recovery on AWS empowered by AI. This approach bridges infrastructure insights and application-level testing, enabling more effective disaster recovery preparation. You will learn how to leverage Large Language Models (LLMs) with AWS Resilience Hub and AWS Systems Manager to modernize testing, analyze infrastructure, and generate targeted AWS Fault Injection Service experiments and recovery runbooks. Walk away with practical examples of automated test generation with templates and learn to design prompts.
abstract_cn: 并非所有灾难恢复策略都能应对现代云基础设施复杂、动态的特性，导致系统弹性和合规性方面存在差距。了解如何通过AI增强AWS上的弹性和灾难恢复能力。这种方法连接了基础设施洞察和应用程序级测试，实现更有效的灾难恢复准备。您将学习如何利用大语言模型(LLM)结合AWS Resilience Hub和AWS Systems Manager来现代化测试、分析基础设施，并生成有针对性的AWS Fault Injection Service实验和恢复运行手册。通过实际示例掌握使用模板自动生成测试的方法，并学习设计提示词。
